generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings and crosswalks, typical of a road where vehicles and pedestrians interact.
- sidewalk: The area on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road and separated by a curb, is designated for pedestrians and cyclists, as evidenced by people walking and cycling there.
- building: The large, ornate structure with "Hamburger Hof" signage and multiple windows is clearly a building.
- pole: A vertical pole supporting a traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is mounted on a pole on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on the building facade, and another sign is mounted on a pole near the center of the image.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking across the road and sidewalk, including a woman in a floral dress crossing the street and a group of people on the left side.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked or driving on the road, including a black sedan on the right and a dark-colored car in the middle of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
